Authors:
Mansoureh Mirabolfathy, Yu-Ming Ju, Huei-Mei Hsieh, Jack D.
Rogers
Title:
Obolarina persica sp. nov., associated with dying Quercus in
Iran
Abstract:
Obolarina persica sp. nov. is described from Iran. It is
widely associated with dying Quercus brantii, but no attempts by
inoculations, etc. have been done to determine the role of this fungus
in the disease. The fungus described herein differs from the other
described species, Obolarina dryophila, primarily in its much larger
ascospores.
